articles.description: Alex Cora didn’t agree with a crucial double-play call made in the sixth inning of the Red Sox’s 5-4 loss to the Angels on Wednesday. In the bottom of the fifth inning, the Angels took a 4-2 lead on back-to-back homers by All-Stars Shohei Ohtani and Jared Wal…
